title: Rito Autobans
body:
It has come to my attention that rito has started to autoban, here's how it works, in the past there were actual people to review actual complaints, so if you were swearing and the like you got a strike against you until eventually a ban. While that was far from a perfect system it was tolerable. It was reasonably ok, but now they have gotten rid of people entirely, your conversations DO NOT get reviewed, if you are reported in a row the system will autoban you, and here's the funny part, it will give you the conversation you had in those 3 games. Now you look at the conversation for all the games and there isn't even a swear word in there, no bullying, just basic talk. It becomes very clear that they are nothing but bot banning. So say goodbye to your accounts because any report at all will stack up until you get banned out of the game.


Game 1
Tactrix: good for us
Tactrix: bad for them
Tactrix: lol yea
Tactrix: no we are blue side
Tactrix: nj
Tactrix: nj
Tactrix: wtb tank who actually fuckin tanks
Tactrix: malph thats twice in a row they went in on us and u just stood there
Tactrix: should what?
Tactrix: speak english
Tactrix: really what
Tactrix: i did nearly full dmg to him
Tactrix: report him
Tactrix: not my fault ur gonna get banned after this game
Tactrix: by being a worthless player
Tactrix: everyone report him for no coop with team
Tactrix: and toxic
Tactrix: plz report malph completely useless and refuses to play with team
Tactrix: we only blamed you for what was your fault not on us if you suck
Tactrix: how many times did u gank bot?
Tactrix: oh tahts right none
Tactrix: he talks a lot since he doesnt actually do anything in the game, he can run his mouth all game instead
Tactrix: keep talking malph its all ur good for
Tactrix: we dont have a team
Tactrix: we have 4 people
Tactrix: 2 of whome spend the whole game crying
Tactrix: because malph is too retareded to play
Tactrix: and nid is just too focused on feeding them all
Tactrix: LOL look at chmp dmg at the end of the game fail malph
Tactrix: and then shut ur mouth and go back to bots where u belong
Tactrix: thats the problem ur not playing as a tank
Tactrix: ur just sitting back and doing nothing
Tactrix: see what i mean
Tactrix: hes the tank that sits in the back
Tactrix: doesnt ult
Tactrix: does do shit
Tactrix: just sits behind our entire line
Tactrix: and does nothing
Tactrix: the second u stop feeding the enemy team
Tactrix: malph compared to u everyone is amazing
Tactrix: those minions are amazing
Tactrix: hey malph if u spent as much time playing as u do running ur mouth u might win ever
Tactrix: yea because u play 2 games a year
Tactrix: and get carried in 1 of them
Tactrix: report malph toxic and worthless

Game 2
Tactrix: so support poppy
Tactrix: should be fun
Tactrix: we dont actually have a wall to get hit into
Tactrix: so that will be easy
Tactrix: we dont have a top now
Tactrix: saving for a BF?
Tactrix: have u ever even played trist before?
Tactrix: yea i have
Tactrix: which is why i have kills while u dont
Tactrix: u didnt even ult
Tactrix: u werent CCed they hit me
Tactrix: close
Tactrix: ok and u just sit there while they destroy sion
Tactrix: ...
Tactrix: nj
Tactrix: no do something
Tactrix: do AA
Tactrix: anything to try to help
Tactrix: heres the lesson you should take away from all this
Tactrix: dont play ranked
Tactrix: go do a bunch of normals
Tactrix: because u have no clue how to adc
Tactrix: yup just keep feeding its what ur good at
Tactrix: 5 times?
Tactrix: because u seem to have a lot of excuses
Tactrix: no skill
Tactrix: but a lot of excuses
Tactrix: take ur own advice
Tactrix: yes u do sound like a retard
Tactrix: lol when the person whos so bad at ADC they don't know that they're bad tries to talk its hilarious
Tactrix: no you'd be way worse
Tactrix: you could be as bad as u are
Tactrix: meanwhile trist does... nothing
Tactrix: as usual
Tactrix: u werent at base
Tactrix: but nice try liar
Tactrix: i just saw u at the turret
Tactrix: whatever liar
Tactrix: i have some
Tactrix: unlike ur dumb ass
Tactrix: who cant even do anything
Tactrix: yea can you spell loser? because thats what u are
Tactrix: easy
Tactrix: your playing
Tactrix: yea i know
Tactrix: gg report trist for being toxic and useless
Tactrix: its a fact you are useless

Game 3
Tactrix: for u dying?
Tactrix: u died on your own
Tactrix: it had nothing to do with me
Tactrix: no u died because u went in afterward against 3
Tactrix: thats on u
Tactrix: thats because u play in bronze
Tactrix: go for it
Tactrix: nj varus
Tactrix: guys its retard varus, its called a hybrid u moron
Tactrix: yea when urs adc goes mid because hes uselss sure lets call it feeding 1v2
Tactrix: you are bronze
Tactrix: you
Tactrix: do you?
Tactrix: is still crying?
Tactrix: i muted him ages ago
Tactrix: gg

Those are the chat logs.

replies.body: Incorrect: the automated system reviews your games and makes strikes against you.

And how exactly does it review your games? it doesn't because it's a bot, it's obvious when you feed but beyond that it literally does nothing but count the complaints against you and autobans. Regardless of any truth in the allegations.

Erm...

You realize that learning AI is a thing, right?

It knows how to read your chat history and distinguish between toxicity and non-toxicity.

Obviously it's not perfect, but it's pretty good.

First if that were even remotely true then most then half of them would be banned over me. Second if that were true they wouldn't have the results SECONDS after the game ended which it itself speaks volumes to the "fairness" you speak of.

The amount of time needed for an automated review is seconds or less. All it has to do is parse your chat for keywords that are typically associated with toxic behavior (fun fact: cursing alone does not count as toxic) and then sum it up to see if it's severe enough to warrant a punishment.

As for the claim that others would be banned before you; just because others have not yet been banned does not mean that your own punishment should be delayed or voided. Perhaps what they're doing/saying is harder to detect, or maybe they haven't been doing it for as long as you have. Unless you've literally been playing with them the entirety of their time in League, you don't have the necessary information to say "they should be banned over me".

http://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

My own "punishment" is a direct result of their toxicity, what you're saying is that if someone is treating you like shit you should mute them every game and ignore everything else right? Here's the problem, if you do that you will completely have no communication and MOST of the games will be silent. Now if that sounds like fun to you by all means be my guest and have at it. It sounds like a boring pointless game to me.

Whether you mute or not, the key is to not respond to toxicity with some of your own. Regardless of whether the provoked response is justified or not, it's still not good for the situation.

http://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
but as you can see most of it isn't, it's just me responding to what they were saying(god I wish they would include the full log).

At this point in the discussion, the issue is that your definition of toxicity differs from that held by others (including, apparently, Riot's bot (which is directly influenced by player reports)).

http://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
I agree, it's wildly different, their definition doesn't seem to take into account human emotion. I guess it's my fault for assuming people would you know, think like people.

In a purely rational society, there wouldn't be any behavior that is deliberately inflammatory, as that would impede productivity. Since human society is nowhere near perfectly efficient, we can quickly conclude that people must not be entirely rational.

Whoever deliberately starts a conflict where no long-term (and precious little short-term) benefit can be gained is obviously not thinking rationally. In this case it would be whoever started the toxicity in that game. It is down to each other person to *refuse to respond to said toxicity*, to avoid exacerbating or even simply continuing the negativity.

THAT is what your punishment is for (assuming of course that you didn't start the conflict in the first place): participating in the conflict in a way that increases either the intensity or duration of the negative emotions/discussions/behavior.

The bot catches both the instigator and additional participants using the same algorithms, but there is no need to distinguish the two because both are guilty, though of slightly different crimes. If punishments for starting a fight were in any way different from the punishments for joining in or reacting to inflammatory behavior, then the bot would have to be better able to read context. As of now, though, the punishments are the same; whether or not they should be is a different discussion which doesn't really apply to your situation at the moment.

http://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect

An automated system can genuinely check your games in _seconds,_ it's not restricted by human reading and reaction times.  Also, you aren't generally banned for just one game, it's a culmination of negativity and toxicity, so perhaps they hadn't had enough games flagged as toxic by the system yet.  Also, the system doesn't ban person A over person B: if both are toxic, they'll both be marked as toxic, and if they've had enough toxic games they'll both get the boot.

That's what I've been trying to tell you, it IS a bot, but it's not a bot that knows how to detect fairness, because not only was there no toxicity in those games but I got an S- for 2 out of 3 of them. Now you can't tell me that I threw the game or played it badly when the system itself game be positive reviews on the actual gameplay. You can believe me or not, but I'm just trying to warn you that if you get people reporting you from now on regardless of whether you have actually done anything wrong after a few times you will get a penalty from it.

how about you post your chat logs that the system gave you and let the community tell you whether you were being toxic or not after examining them, because a lot of times people's assessments of their own toxicity have proven unreliable.
I have now posted chat logs at the top in the original post.

Lol, no. Lets see those chatlogs, bub. I bet we can find all sorts of nice stuff in them.

TL;DR No logs, no care.

Ah I'm so happy you brought up chatlogs, which brings me to reasoning #2. There are no longer chat logs, just logs of what you say, so it's literally my side of the conversation with thin air, There is no context what so ever. No context makes it seem ridiculous.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9ZnOZ3l,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-10-20T01:23:37.857+0000)
>
> Ah I'm so happy you brought up chatlogs, which brings me to reasoning #2. There are no longer chat logs, just logs of what you say, so it's literally my side of the conversation with thin air, There is no context what so ever. No context makes it seem ridiculous.

Well, you say all you have is basic talk, so there's nothing in your chat logs that should be bad.
I have posted them in the original post check them.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9ZnOZ3l,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T01:28:47.014+0000)
>
> I have posted them in the original post check them.

I agree with the ban decision. Assuming malph WAS a feeder, and not just having a hard time with their computer, how were you helping the situation by being a total asshat?
Dude he wasn't just a feeder he was a straight up troll, he kept taunting us ALL game, like he would feed, then in the time he was dead he would taunt us.
I have now put them in the original post.
I looked at the chat logs, and I agree with the automated decision.
Of course you do because you only see my side of the conversation, if you saw the full conversation you'd see that they deserve a ban much more then I ever did.

You're responsible for your actions, they are responsible for theirs.

"But they were worse!" is not an accepted excuse. They will be judged in their own cases.
I'll remember you said that when you get 3 feeders that consistently cost you the game and YOU get banned for it.
Considering I usually just chalk the game to the bad luck of getting those people, no I wont. I keep my anger out of chat because I know it wont help.

See that's easy to say when you aren't support, the problem is when you are support and you're doing everything you can to keep them alive and then they feed and BLAME YOU! It's a lot harder to keep yourself "in check".
And yet, it's required. You're not the only support in the game that gets poor teammates. Show some self control.

I'm also not the only support that gets pissed off at this game, we have people in LCS that have been banned outright for it. A good portion of them openly admit they can be toxic but this is the kind of game where sometimes you just lose it. That's part of competition, but getting banned for being "toxic" when being toxic is nothing more then calling a spade a spade is ridiculous. They will lose most of the real player interest because of this PG attitude. People in real competition get mad, and even swear, in every single sport on the planet, but these guys want to punish you endlessly for being human.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9ZnOZ3l,comment-id=00050000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T01:51:52.452+0000)
>
> I'm also not the only support that gets pissed off at this game, we have people in LCS that have been banned outright for it. A good portion of them openly admit they can be toxic but this is the kind of game where sometimes you just lose it. That's part of competition, but getting banned for being "toxic" when being toxic is nothing more then calling a spade a spade is ridiculous. They will lose most of the real player interest because of this PG attitude. People in real competition get mad, and even swear, in every single sport on the planet, but these guys want to punish you endlessly for being human.

You don't get banned for 'sometimes losing it'. You get banned for REPEATEDLY losing it.

You don't get punished just for being reported. Reports only result in your case being reviewed.

What matters is your behavior in those reported matches, and the system checks for offending behavior and weeds out false reports. I recommend posting your chat logs so we can review them with you and help shed some light on why you may have been punished.

IF the punishment was an error, you can request Riot manually review it through a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

If that were true then there would be no instant response, there was, and I've checked this multiple times now, it's a within seconds of the game ending result. They have taken it from an actual review board to an autobot.

The automated system actually does review your logs. It is not usually necessary for a manual review to determine guilt.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/reports-how-do-they-work
Saving this link for future reference...
This one might be better; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-
Thank you!

An automated _reviewing_ bot, yes, they have.  That's the system DTN is referring to, the automated one that reviews chat logs, looks for toxicity, and makes judgements on whether or not a toxicity report is valid from there.

It don't matter what you say man, these so called community members, aren't really here to help you at all. They are here to see you post your chat log, obviously it's going to have some salt from you, but mostly from the other team. They look see one salt and blame you. These people are the Dick Riders Of RITO.
That's what I'm saying, and rito took away the other chat on purpose, because far be it for them to look stupid for banning someone for trolls flaming them the whole game.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9ZnOZ3l,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-10-20T05:13:21.233+0000)
>
> That's what I'm saying, and rito took away the other chat on purpose, because far be it for them to look stupid for banning someone for trolls flaming them the whole game.

No, the reason as to why only your chat shows is because in the end the only person that matters is you. This is your reform card and no one elses, and it's your actions alone that led you to this point. It doesn't matter if someone else started it, you got punished because you retaliated negatively. In the future if someone refuses to stop acting up then just mute, report and move on. Doing this ensures that you don't get punished for something that you didn't do. From [Understanding the Tribunal](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2726400): 

>**4) That player in my game was far worse than me. Why am I banned???**
a) I'll keep this one simple: retaliation isn't OK. Reacting to a toxic player by being toxic just incites that player to be even worse--it also ruins the game for up to 8 other players. It is far, far worse to watch two people yelling at each other all game than it is to watch 1 player ranting into blank space. Almost everyone in the game can find someone out there that behaves worse than they do--but so what? Finding someone worse doesn't justify your behavior or justify retaliation. We expect more out of our players. What players often don't realize is... those other players in your game that you thought were worse? Nearly 100% of the time, those players were banned even before you were. If someone is being toxic, just report them and move on. If you retaliate, both of you will be banned. It's really that simple.

From [Riot Tantram](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/unobngtr-how-player-behavior-penalties-affect-hextech-crafting?show=rundown): 

>Actually, Erdrik is correct here.

>A report flags a game for review. They do not establish guilt. The game is then reviewed for harassment, feeding, etc. This is why 'troll reporting' or 'gang reporting' do not work. False or inaccurate reports are thrown out.

>You cannot ever be punished for saying nothing .. unless of course it's for something gameplay related like feeding, afking or cheating. But, you can never be punished for offensive language, hate speech or verbal abuse if you said nothing.

Bottom line is you want a game where everyone acts civil and expresses no hateful feelings at all, its a bunch of BS, that's not how humans work especially in competitive environments. "we want our players" no one cares how you want your players, players are all different, they come from different backgrounds, their reactions are different, just because you established rules where you need to mute most of the people in the game doesn't make it logical or sane.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9ZnOZ3l,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T07:33:14.617+0000)
>
> Bottom line is you want a game where everyone acts civil and expresses no hateful feelings at all, its a bunch of BS, that's not how humans work especially in competitive environments. "we want our players" no one cares how you want your players, players are all different, they come from different backgrounds, their reactions are different, just because you established rules where you need to mute most of the people in the game doesn't make it logical or sane.

.006% of the people get permabanned. You are an outlier, not the norm. Don't act like this happens to everyone, it happens to comparatively few people. It's not the game. It's not the other people.

It's you.

You are an egotist. You think everything revolves around you. You don't think of anyone else.

Do you think the game is that rigged against you? Good. Leave. Go away. Shoo. Come back when you've matured.

I might take you seriously if you played more then 8 ranked games, you have no clue how it actually gets around people who actively try to win when you have half the team that spends all that time flaming and feeding. Matured? How about you come back when you've played more then a day worth of games in your entire ranked career.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9ZnOZ3l,comment-id=000800000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T07:58:53.787+0000)
>
> I might take you seriously if you played more then 8 ranked games, you have no clue how it actually gets around people who actively try to win when you have half the team that spends all that time flaming and feeding. Matured? How about you come back when you've played more then a weeks worth of games in your entire life.

I played ranked regularly in... season 4? In silver, which can be pretty bad? I just mute them and keep playing. Again, you are responsible for yourself here, you should be capable of withholding yourself.

congratz you played regularly in a season where there were no autobans, and near everything was completely different. This is what I mean, you have no clue how it actually is now, everything has gotten way more intensified, in their efforts to balance this game they instead made it severely unbalanced. We have champs now that are designed to 1 shot, and apparently this isn't a problem, every time people say they are OP instead of nerfing them they just keep boosting them up like master yi and darius.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9ZnOZ3l,comment-id=00080000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T08:07:01.396+0000)
>
> congratz you played regularly in a season where there were no autobans, and near everything was completely different. This is what I mean, you have no clue how it actually is now, everything has gotten way more intensified, in their efforts to balance this game they instead made it severely unbalanced. We have champs now that are designed to 1 shot, and apparently this isn't a problem, every time people say they are OP instead of nerfing them they just keep boosting them up like master yi and darius.

Again. All of this is stuff that you are blaming rather than looking at your own reactions. You aren't taking any responsibility for your actions. It isn't your fault you act out, it's the game's balance.
Yea if I wanted a shrink I'd get one, you really shouldn't try at it, you're not very good.

> [{quoted}](name=Tactrix,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=N9ZnOZ3l,comment-id=0008000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-20T08:22:47.853+0000)
>
> Yea if I wanted a shrink I'd get one, you really shouldn't try at it, you're not very good.

Sure, skippy. You can realize it's on you or not. It's you getting banned again, not me.
